message.title: Update Mozilla VPN
message.subtitle: We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Update to the latest version for the best possible Mozilla VPN experience. This update includes minor bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements.

blocks.content: Be sure to update the app to make it even easier to protect your devices and your activity online!
Be sure to get the latest version to make it even easier to protect your devices and your activity online!
We’ve released an updated version of Mozilla VPN! Download it today to get the newest features and bug fixes.
